name: How not to steal a castle
name_original: How not to steal a castle
description:
Have you ever dreamed about being a thief ? Well you know...You shouldn't...That's bad.

But here you can play as a robber hanging on in a whimsical castle, try to get all the magical stuff that lay here and there. And what about trying to be the best thief around. Try to beat your timer every time you enter the castle.

Controls:

 W/A/S/D to move (Z/Q/S/D also works)

Shift to slide

Space to Jump

Abilities (throught you unlocked it ...)

You may encounter some object under a couple of spotlights, its collectibles object. So when you're close to one, try to press E, magic will do the rest.

Once you unlocked them:

Right click --> Explosive frog - it can boost you !

Left click --> Cosy Pillow - it protect you !

And also the UniShoes ! That allow you to Run on the walls ! 

I hope you will have a good time robbing  hanging in that castle and remember to stay in the right path !

This Project has been made for the Speed Jam 01 ! I wasn't alone working on this project. Here is the team !

JULIE Mathieu: Programation

SAINT GEORGES JOUAN Jolan: 3D artist and animation

GABARD Natan:  3D artist

IZADPANAH Quentin (me): Level design
